name: charset_g0_dec_graphics
description: ESC ( 0 designates G0 as DEC Special Graphics â€” no immediate grid effect, cursor unchanged
comment: Print XY at (0,0)-(0,1), cursor at (0,2). ESC ( 0 designates DEC graphics for G0 slot. Print Z at (0,2). Cursor at (0,3). Charset designation itself has no grid effect in the harness.
